name: Ultimate Axon Kicker
effectText:
1 Psychic Synchro Monster + 1 Psychic monster
Must first be Fusion Summoned from the Extra Deck. Cannot be destroyed by card effects. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. If this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the GY: Gain LP equal to the destroyed monster's original ATK.
